about_the_game: Composed by Saša Dukić, the famous psytrance producer also known as Psilocybian, Eyes in the Dark OST features 50 minutes of weird and twisted electronica. Through 19 mind-bending tracks Saša blends his world famous downtempo with an increasing eerie blend of lo-fi chiptunes, glitch hop and IDM. It's different-yet-familiar nostalgia-fueled mind bending might delight and surprise you, or it might just make your back hair stand up straight as you wonder what you just listened to.
detailed_description: Composed by Saša Dukić, the famous psytrance producer also known as Psilocybian, Eyes in the Dark OST features 50 minutes of weird and twisted electronica. Through 19 mind-bending tracks Saša blends his world famous downtempo with an increasing eerie blend of lo-fi chiptunes, glitch hop and IDM. It's different-yet-familiar nostalgia-fueled mind bending might delight and surprise you, or it might just make your back hair stand up straight as you wonder what you just listened to.
